title: Revel Wheels RW27 MTB wheelset delivers Fusion-Fiber tech in lighter package
content:
Just before everything went sideways in 2020, Revel Bikes introduced their new brand – Revel Wheels. More than just another me-too carbon wheel brand, Revel Wheels brought something new to the table. Partnering up with the team behind Fusion-fiber, Revel introduced the RW30 wheelset. Now, Revel is bringing that same Fusion-Fiber tech to a wheelset […]

The post Revel Wheels RW27 MTB wheelset delivers Fusion-Fiber tech in lighter package appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
